**Problem:**
No automation or analytics features are present.

**Proposed Solution:**
Add tools for automating tasks (e.g., reminders, attendance tracking) and analytics/reporting dashboards.

**Benefits:**
- Saves time
- Provides insights into participation and activity trends

**Additional context:**
See Evolvve-Student-Chapter-App for reference.
